channel.title: Econumo-One on Econumo
channel.description: Recent content in Econumo-One on Econumo

item.title: v0.2.0 Econumo release
item.description: Changelog # Removed the legacy PostgreSQL dependency. Added an X-Timezone header to each API request to maintain consistent time zones between the frontend and backend. Addressed all of Rector’s warnings. Removed the old analytics API. GitHub releases # Econumo One: v0.2.0 Econumo Family: v0.2.0

item.title: v0.1.0 Econumo release
item.description: The first public release of Econumo. GitHub releases # Econumo One: v0.1.0 Econumo Family: v0.1.0
